ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Farewell Shada; safe journey
ygData.msgSnippet: You will be missed. Ever since I joined this list I looked forward to your insightful posts here and on the Concert Hall. Good luck with RL. :) Sartori
ygData.messageBody:
You will be missed. Ever since I joined this list I looked forward to your
insightful posts here and on the Concert Hall. Good luck with RL. :)

Sartori D'Elsiraad <Legion>, Veeshan
60th Bard...YES, I hit 60th yesterday...Hell hath frozen over.


>From: RKR <rkroads@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
>To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Farewell Shada; safe journey
>Date: Mon, 26 Mar 2001 07:41:49 -0800 (PST)
>
> > No I loved my bard and my guild and the game, I just was playing too
>long
> > (2.5 years now) and saw a very short to no future left for me. I've
>seen
> > and done just about everything there is to do, and wanted to get back to
>the
> > real world. So account cancelled, all characters deleted.
> >
> > Shada Iceheart [Retired]
